promR 0.1.1
  • Reference

promR

R library for reading and analysing metrics stored on a Prometheus server.

Installation

You can install promR using devtools:

if (requireNamespace("devtools", quietly = TRUE)) {
    devtools::install_github('glenn-m/promR')
} else {
    install.packages("devtools")
    devtools::install_github('glenn-m/promR')
}

Usage

Instant Query

To retrieve the value of the go_goroutines metric 60 seconds ago.

library(promR)
prom <- Prometheus$new(host = "http://demo.robustperception.io", port = 9090)
# Timestamps can be in rfc3339 or unix format
metrics_instant <- prom$query(query = "go_goroutines", time = as.POSIXct(Sys.time() - 60))

Output:

name instance job timestamp value port
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 1556402663.85 105 9090
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io pushgateway 1556402663.85 45 9091
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io alertmanager 1556402663.85 38 9093
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io node 1556402663.85 11 9100

Range Query

library(promR)
prom <- Prometheus$new(host = "http://demo.robustperception.io", port = 9090)
metrics_range <- prom$rangeQuery(
  query = "go_goroutines",
  start = as.numeric(as.POSIXct(Sys.time() - 600)),
  end = as.numeric(as.POSIXct(Sys.time())),
  step = "10s"
)

Output:

name instance job port timestamp value
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 9090 1556402123.995 95
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 9090 1556402133.995 95
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 9090 1556402143.995 95
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 9090 1556402153.995 99
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 9090 1556402163.995 95
go_goroutines demo.robustperception.io prometheus 9090 1556402173.995 95

Metadata Query

Get metadata for all node exporter metrics.

library(promR)
prom <- Prometheus$new(host = "http://demo.robustperception.io", port = 9090)
metrics_metadata <- prom$metadataQuery(match_target = '{job="node"}')

Output:

metric type help unit instance job
node_netstat_Icmp_InMsgs unknown Statistic IcmpInMsgs. demo.robustperception.io:9100 node
node_netstat_TcpExt_SyncookiesFailed unknown Statistic TcpExtSyncookiesFailed. demo.robustperception.io:9100 node
node_network_dormant gauge dormant value of /sys/class/net/. demo.robustperception.io:9100 node
node_memory_MemFree_bytes gauge Memory information field MemFree_bytes. demo.robustperception.io:9100 node
node_filesystem_size_bytes gauge Filesystem size in bytes. demo.robustperception.io:9100 node
node_netstat_UdpLite_InErrors unknown Statistic UdpLiteInErrors. demo.robustperception.io:9100 node

Get metadata for all metrics.

library(promR)
prom <- Prometheus$new(host = "http://demo.robustperception.io", port = 9090)
metrics_metadata <- prom$metadataQuery(match_target = '{job=~".+"}')

Output:

metric type help unit instance job
prometheus_sd_kubernetes_cache_last_resource_version gauge Last resource version from the Kubernetes API. demo.robustperception.io:9090 prometheus
prometheus_tsdb_compactions_total counter Total number of compactions that were executed for the partition. demo.robustperception.io:9090 prometheus
prometheus_tsdb_head_chunks_created_total counter Total number of chunks created in the head demo.robustperception.io:9090 prometheus
prometheus_tsdb_head_series_created_total counter Total number of series created in the head demo.robustperception.io:9090 prometheus
go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes gauge Number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table. demo.robustperception.io:9090 prometheus
prometheus_rule_group_iterations_total counter The total number of scheduled rule group evaluations, whether executed or missed. demo.robustperception.io:9090 prometheus

  3. Make your changes
  4. Run devtools::test() to ensure tests are passing.
